bwwExcerpt: Director Alex Timbers' ingenious staging puts the audience in the middle the action. Be ready to move and groove with the ace ensemble led by Jose Llana as Ferdinand Marcos, Conrad Ricamora as Ninoy and the incandescent Ruthie Ann Miles as the Philippine First Lady.
